parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: Scope of the custom metric: HIT or PRODUCT.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: Boolean indicating whether the custom metric is active.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The fields which the response should show.

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: Name of the JavaScript callback function that handles the response.

parameter.name: prettyPrint
parameter.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameter.name: userIp
parameter.description: IP address of the end user for whom the API call is being made.

parameter.name: webPropertyId
parameter.description: Web property ID for the custom metrics to create.

parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: Account ID for the custom metrics to create.

parameter.name: customMetricsId
parameter.description: ID of the custom metrics to create patch.

parameter.name: ignoreCustomDataSourceLinks
parameter.description: Force the update and ignore any warnings related to the custom dimension being linked to a custom data source / data set.
